Sentencas: Internally reformed solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) where partial oxidation of methane was used as the reforming reaction were investigated.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane for internally reformed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrical power generated as well as the activity for the partial oxidation of methane are strongly dependent on the oxide ion conductivity of the electrolyte used.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane for internally reformed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Among the oxide ion conductors examined, perovskite oxide of LaGaO3 doped with Sr and Mg gives the highest electrical power, and a gaseous mixture of CO and H-2 at the molar ratio of 2 was obtained.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane for internally reformed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3, Ni, and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 were used as electrolyte, anode, and cathode, respectively, and the gaseous mixture of CH4/O = 4 was fed, the electrical power density and yield of synthesis gas consisting of CO and H-2 attained was 336 mW cm(-2) and 70%, respectively.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane for internally reformed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electrical power as well as the CH4 conversion was stably sustained over a 30 h examination.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane for internally reformed solid oxide fuel cell
